subject: Basketball
Labor and Jobs
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: A critical weekend of N.B.A. labor talks will begin Saturday with an owners’ meeting, and hard-liners on both sides are insisting that no more financial concessions be made.
snippet: A critical weekend of N.B.A. labor talks will begin Saturday with an owners’ meeting, and hard-liners on both sides are insisting that no more financial concessions be made.
